attributes.action: Lobby World leaders to create a permanent Olympics site in Greece
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Encourage the sporting countries of the world to invest in the creation of a permanent site in Greece for the Olympic games to be held in perpituity. If all interested countries invested £20million now to build a purpose built site in the natural home of the olympics we would not see countries such as ours going through this rediculous charade every four years and beggaring themselves to host the games.
Each participating country could then pay a fee per athlete to enter.
